entry.title: New release for Pulse: v3.33.1
entry.content:
ğŸ”§ Version 3.33.1

Critical fix for in-app update functionality.

What's Fixed

ğŸ› Bug Fix

  • Update Process - Fixed crash during in-app updates caused by missing WebSocket reference in modularized update routes

ğŸš¨ Affected Versions

The following versions have broken in-app updates: - v3.33.0-rc1 - v3.33.0-rc2
- v3.33.0

Note: v3.32.0 and earlier versions can update directly to v3.33.1 without issues.

ğŸ“ If You're Stuck on an Affected Version

If your in-app update fails, you can manually update using: bash sudo /opt/pulse/scripts/install-pulse.sh --update

entry.title: New release for Pulse: v3.41.0
entry.content:
ğŸ‰ Version 3.41.0

This release brings an interactive backup frequency chart, enhanced diagnostics, improved security, and numerous bug fixes.

What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features

  • Interactive Backup Frequency Chart - Visual bar chart on the backups tab showing daily backup counts with click-to-filter functionality
  • Enhanced Diagnostics Page - Added environment info, connectivity tests, error logs, and improved information density
  • Copy Sanitized Report - New button to copy diagnostics report with sensitive data automatically redacted
  • Security Warnings - Added warnings for overly permissive API tokens in diagnostics

ğŸš€ Improvements

  • Update Section UI/UX - Major improvements to update section with better visual design and dev version protection
  • Memory Display - Shows used memory instead of free memory with fallback calculations
  • Rate Limits - Increased rate limits for better frontend experience
  • Storage Monitoring - Fixed chart dimming issue and improved storage tab functionality
  • Backup Status Clarity - Improved UI indicators for backup verification status
  • Diagnostics UI - Better visual indicators and clearer permission-related messages

ğŸ› Bug Fixes

  • Keyboard Input - Fixed keyboard input capture issue on backups tab search
  • Mobile UI - Resolved mobile interface issues and alert save functionality
  • PBS Configuration - Simplified PBS setup process
  • Permission Documentation - Corrected missing Mapping.Audit permission in PVEAuditor docs
  • Security Warnings - Fixed inaccurate root token security warning
  • Docker Compose - Added data volume for persistent metrics storage

ğŸ“¥ Installation & Updates

See the Updating Pulse section in README for detailed update instructions.

ğŸ³ Docker Images

  • docker pull rcourtman/pulse:v3.41.0
  • docker pull rcourtman/pulse:latest
